lead_paragraph: Sampdoria have signed Italy defender Andrea Ranocchia on loan until the end of the season from Inter Milan, the Genoa-based club said on their website (www.sampdoria.it).

headline.print_headline: Sampdoria Sign Former Inter Captain Ranocchia on Loan
headline.main: Sampdoria Sign Former Inter Captain Ranocchia on Loan
